description.@en: You utter a single word of such power that it obliterates others, condemning them to the swell of chaos beyond.

criticalFailure.@en: Your words unwittingly unravel your hold over Magick. You immediately suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage and are left Helpless for one Turn.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but those caught in the Burst Template cannot Resist this Magick.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, all those who are caught within the Burst Template immediately suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage. In addition, those who fail to Resist with a Resolve Test are left Helpless for one Turn.

reagents.@en: The blood of an Abyssal creature (expended)
